description: Politicians seeking re-election will not be in a hurry to block an app used by up to 170 million Americans.  Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: TikTok likely safe from ban in US until after presidential election
title_page: TikTok likely safe from ban in US until after presidential election | The Straits Times
maintext:
BALTIMORE, Maryland – A Bill forcing Chinese company ByteDance to sell TikTok or face a ban in the United States will likely hang fire until after the Nov 5 presidential election.
After its quick passage with strong bipartisan support through the House of Representatives on March 13, the Bill is now up before the Senate.
